bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon w/ aero shaped tubes, internal cable routing, extended seat tube, integrated alloy cupped head tube, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: D6 high modulus carbon aero stays w/ brake cavity design, cold forged dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 carbon aero monocoque w/ 1 1/8" carbon steerer w/ internal routing
Shimano Dura Ace Di2, F-type, braze-on mount
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 Electronic TT shifter, 20-speed
Oval 9105 carbon rims w/ alloy braking surface, 100mm R, 85mm F, straight pull DT Swiss aero-spokes 16/20H, sealed bearing hubs
Tektro T-925 Tri w/ cartridge pads
Selle Italia SL T1 w/ tubular manganese rails
